verses.name: Leviticus 9:1
verses.text: And it came to pass on the eighth day, that Moses called Aaron and his sons, and the elders of Israel;

verses.name: Leviticus 9:2
verses.text: And he said unto Aaron, Take thee a young calf for a sin offering, and a ram for a burnt offering, without blemish, and offer them before the Lord.

verses.name: Leviticus 9:3
verses.text: And unto the children of Israel thou shalt speak, saying, Take ye a kid of the goats for a sin offering; and a calf and a lamb, both of the first year, without blemish, for a burnt offering;
